item.title: Version 1.1.11
item.description:
Protip: Turn off Asynchronous Reprojection in Lone Echo and Echo Arena to get rid of jitter/judder issues.

Changes

  • Added a new and improved "Trigger as Grip" mode enabled by default with help from @GiantSox
  • Releasing the trackpad now only gives a "thumbs-up" if the grip button is pressed
  • Improved touch controller offsets to make the helmet buttons easier to reach in Lone Echo (#694)
